name: Air Attack VR
description:
Welcome to "Air Attack", an arcade avia/auto simulator!
Take personal control of a fighter/armored vehicle, perform various missions, upgrade the equipment available. Explore the territory, capture all enemy bases. Your motto: "Only one will remain!"
Exciting aerial and ground battles await you, an upgrade system for all available vehicles, a dangerous enemy, and an adrenaline rush!
- Territory Reconnaissance;
- Air/ground battles;
- Capturing enemy bases;
- Equipment upgrades
